description: Removal of Condition 10(b) (Landscaping Details) of planning permission reference 21/3077/S73 dated 21/09/21 for 'Erection of 2 no. penthouse apartments to each of the 3 no. existing main blocks, demolition of existing single dwelling and erection of new single storey dwelling, remodelling of existing car park layout including relandscaping with the addition of 11 no. car parking spaces, relocation of entrance to refuse store to Sunny Gardens Road'Condition Number(s): 10(b)Conditions(s) Removal:Condition 10(b) relates to the submission of landscaping details on any phase beyond Phase 1 . Phase 1 relates to the demolition and construction of the Villa, and all landscaping details for this have been discharged via Condition 10(a) (landscaping) approved under 18/6625/CON.Phase 2 and onwards refers to this application: the construction of top floor apartments (on top of each existing block) where the landscaping across the site is not changing and therefore there are no landscaping details to submit.  The landscaping across the site has already been approved in layout L5120005C approved under application 17/1664/S73 - this drawing has been uploaded to this application, for ease of reference.The purpose of this Section 73 application is therefore to remove Condition 10(B) as there are no further landscaping works envisaged beyond Phase 1.We wish for the existing condition 10(b) to be removed from the Decision Notice as the landscaping information has already been discharged and there are no further landscaping details to submit.The informative elements of the condition can remain e.g. 10(a).
